keywords.name: Mokoumod:Exhaustion
keywords.description:
When you would die, revive with 100% of your Max HP,
clear your debuffs and gain Exhaustion instead.
You give up if Exhaustion would reach 3.

keywords.name: Mokoumod:LW
keywords.description:
You can only play 1 Last Word per turn.
You can only play Last Words when you have 2 Exhaustion .

keywords.name: Mokoumod:Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.

keywords.name: Mokoumod:SpellEX
keywords.description: You can only play 1 EX Spell Card per turn.

keywords.name: Mokoumod:burst
keywords.description: This effect triggers if the last card played was an Attack.

keywords.name: Mokoumod:ignite
keywords.description: Ignited creatures take damage at the start of the monsters' turn. Each turn, Ignited is reduced by 1.

keywords.name: Mokoumod:keyword
keywords.description: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
